FuncDef: The reset sub-port-queue statistics command resets statistics about sub-interface queues.

ParaDef.Info:
Resets statistics about sub-interface queues for outgoing traffic.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset sub-port-queue statistics interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/0 outbound
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To reset statistics about sub-interface queues, run the reset sub-port-queue statistics command.
Precautions
If sub-interfaces in a group on an interface use the same sub-interface queue profile, the reset sub-port-queue statistics command resets statistics about sub-interface queues on all the sub-interfaces.
